title: COMPANY DETAILS
description: In this section, we will ask you for legal details of your company.

formMainData.name: companyName
formMainData.label: Company name
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the "legal name" of your company (not the trade name) or your name if you are self-employed, in our case it would be: ZIP ONLINE SERVICES SL.

formMainData.name: tradeName
formMainData.label: Trade name
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the "commercial name" of your company, in our case it would be: ZIPTRANSFERS.

formMainData.name: vat
formMainData.label: VAT / IVA / NIF
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the legal identification number of your company (value-added tax). It is known in different ways depending on the country: VAT, IVA, or NIF/CIF.

formGridData.name: zipCode
formGridData.label: Zip code
formGridData.additionalInfo: Also known as Postal Code in some countries.

formGridData.name: country
formGridData.label: Country
formGridData.additionalInfo: This is the country where your company is registered.

formGridData.name: province
formGridData.label: Province - State
formGridData.additionalInfo: This is the province or state where your company is registered.

title: CONTACT INFORMATION
description: In this section, we will ask you for contact information.

formMainData.name: firstName
formMainData.label: First Name
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the first name of the representative of your company.

formMainData.name: lastName
formMainData.label: Last Name
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the last name of the representative of your company.

formMainData.name: position
formMainData.label: Position
formMainData.additionalInfo: This is the position of the representative of your company.

desitionData.name: yesno
desitionData.label: Do you want to receive emails?
